description:
Interactive whiteboard for schools and universities

OpenBoard is an open source cross-platform teaching software for interactive whiteboard designed primarily for use in schools and universities. It can be used both with interactive whiteboards or in a dual-screen setup with a pen-tablet display and a beamer.
What's Changed
- updated to Qt 6.9 on macOS, Debian and Windows
- fixed an issue where glitches would appear if a PDF was rendered in a screen with DPI scaling > 100%
- fixed a bug where a PDF would appear blurry when devicepixelratio is not 1.0
- fixed a bug where the view would be restored to center when clearing scene.
- refactor: unified thumbnails for board and document mode by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1162
- fix: dropping pdf url to board by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1157
- fix: copy ItemOwnZValue when cloning item by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1174
- fix: tool usage with tablet eraser by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1193
- Fix delegate handle recognition by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1106
- Feat: rotate snap indicator and snap rotated items by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1168
- README.md - typo by @max-17 in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1214
- fix: small scene shifts when switching pages by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1220
- fix: import file only once to document by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1158

- fix: spinning message after UBZ import by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1228

- Fix incomplete ubdocument by @letsfindaway in https://github.com/OpenBoard-org/OpenBoard/pull/1237

Known issues
- On any widget, select options (Drop-down lists) won't appear at the right position. Be careful as it sometimes will appear behind the left or right palette of the Board Mode.
